name: Bus Driver Parking Simulator 3d games.
description:
Hill Climb Bus parking
Take your favourite Bus,drive it and park it on a right place.climb the dangerous Hill Paths and park the bus on the right place,be careful while driving,if you impinge your bus,you can loose the level.also there is time limit.user must have to park the car in some duration.so be careful,accurate and speedy to park a bus,this game includes a 3D Models of different types of bus,hill and valley locations.download this game and learn to park the vehicles

Key Features

-> 3D Models of a Different bus

-> different and HD Locations

-> Easy Controlling

-> Easy as well as difficult levels

-> The Game that make user more curious

-> User Friendly game
